700620.name: Temple of Aluxes
700620.description:
Have you ever wanted to explore a lost temple? This is your chance.
Find the treasures and escape the Temple of Aluxes by solving various puzzles and challenges.

Navigate through the old temple and face a variety of challenges. Look everywhere and leave no stone unturned.
Interact with your surroundings by examining objects to find what you need to get out.
Use your scanner to scan the environment for clues. Can you find all the treasures and solve the puzzles to get out?

Features:

  • A variety of challenging puzzles with varying difficulty.
  • Test yourself in both logic puzzles and skill-based challenges.
  • Large play area with several rooms to explore.
  • Hand scanner to find clues.
  • Immersive environment.
  • Room-scale support.
  • Teleportation support.
  • Full locomotion support

Available for Arcades on SpringboardVR
